ComicInfo.Summary:
Cammy risks everything as she dives into the twisted mind of the Shadaloo Doll Decapre. But what she finds there may fracture the Delta Blue team even more... Plus, in a special bonus story, it's a battle of the beasts as Blanka encounters a strange and furry fighter!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Omar Dogan | 1 | B | Cover B Connecting Variant | Robert Porter | 2 | C | 1:10 Homage Cover C | Jeffrey Cruz | 3 | *Notes:* The 1:10 Homage Cover C is a homage of the cover of Superman's Girl Friend, Lois Lane #93.
